user controls face emoji with 'y' (up left), 'u' (up right), 'g' (left), 'h' (pass), 'j' (right), 'b' (down left), 'n' (down right); background tiled https://picsum.photos/16/16; random emoji monsters and collectible items; gems increase score, monsters decrease health
